title: Marcus Morris Sr. - Wikipedia
snippet: Marcus Thomas Morris Sr. (born September 2, 1989) is an American professional basketball player who last played for the Cleveland Cavaliers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played college basketball for the Kansas Jayhawks before being selected 14th overall by the Houston Rockets ...

title: How Many Teams Has Marcus Morris Played For | StatMuse
snippet: Marcus Morris Sr. played for the Rockets from 2011-12 to 2012-13, the Suns from 2012-13 to 2014-15, the Pistons from 2015-16 to 2016-17, the Celtics from 2017-18 to 2018-19, the Knicks in 2019-20, the Clippers from 2019-20 to 2022-23, the 76ers in 2023-24 and the Cavaliers in 2023-24...
